item.title: PyInstaller - Standalone Python Applications for MacOS, Windows, and Linux
item.description: We will explore the use of PyInstaller to create a cross-platform standalone application using python. For this tutorial I will be using Tkinter to visually demonstrate. PyInstaller can be used in Python3 and Python2, similarly it creates applications for MacOS, Windows, and Linux. I will be using: Python 3 MacOS...
